project_title: 3D Virtual Test Track for Autonomous Driving
submission_title: Adversarial 3D Virtual Test Track for Autonomous Driving
summary: A virtual 3D test track, developed using Blender and RoadRunner, simulates complex Bavarian roads with diverse features and international signage designed to challenge autonomous driving AI algorithms.

project_title: Adaptive Palletizing with Simulation Optimization
submission_title: Adaptive Palletizing using Density-Sorted 3D Bin-Packing and Layered Control
summary: This project implements an adaptive palletizing system for variable-sized boxes, utilizing 3D bin packing optimization, layered packing strategies, and RRT-based collision-free path planning in MATLAB/Simulink for a Universal Robot.

project_title: Aggressive Maneuver Stabilization for a Minidrone
submission_title: Nonlinear Geometric Control and Quaternion Estimation for High-Speed Quadrotor Maneuvers
summary: This project demonstrates a quaternion-based state estimator and controller for stabilizing aggressive maneuvers on Parrot minidrones, developed using MATLAB/Simulink and targeting hardware deployment.

project_title: Aggressive Maneuver Stabilization for a Minidrone
submission_title: Quaternion-Based Attitude Control and State Estimation for Aggressive Minidrone Trajectory Tracking
summary: This project implements Sliding Mode Control for quaternion-based attitude and altitude stabilization and trajectory tracking of a Parrot Minidrone in Simulink, utilizing Extended Kalman Filters for state estimation to enable aggressive maneuvers.
authors: Khanh Ky Do,  Aloïs Millot, Antoine Carrel

project_title: Automatically Segment and Label Objects in Video
submission_title: Advanced Video Object Segmentation for MATLAB Labeler
summary: An advanced multi-technique video object segmentation algorithm for MATLAB's Video Labeler, leveraging optical flow, appearance modeling, and superpixel regularization to achieve efficient, accurate, and automated video annotation.

project_title: Automatically Segment and Label Objects in Video
submission_title: Hybrid Multi-Class Video Segmentation with Deep Learning
summary: This hybrid multi-class system uses YOLOv4 detection and a multi-stage classical vision pipeline for mask refinement, automatically generating high-quality pixel labels for video objects and reducing manual labeling time by 85.7%.

project_title: Autonomous Navigation for Vehicles in Rough Terrain
submission_title: Autonomous Navigation for Vehicles in Rough Terrain
summary: This project implements robust rough terrain navigation for mobile robots using MATLAB-ROS co-simulation, featuring global path planning (RRT, A*), AMCL localization, and Simulink-based motion control with obstacle avoidance.

project_title: Autonomous Navigation for Vehicles in Rough Terrain
submission_title: Husky Robot Navigation in Rough Terrain via Cost-Aware Planning
summary: This project demonstrates autonomous navigation for a Husky robot in rough terrain using MATLAB for A*-based path planning considering terrain costs and Simulink-Gazebo co-simulation for control.

project_title: Autonomous Navigation for Vehicles in Rough Terrain
submission_title: RRT-Based Path Planning for Autonomous Navigation of a TurtleBot in Rough Terrain
summary: Autonomous navigation for a TurtleBot3 in a simulated rough environment using MATLAB for RRT*-based path planning and Simulink-Gazebo co-simulation for path following and collision avoidance.

project_title: Autonomous Vehicle Localization Using Onboard Sensors and HD Geolocated Maps
submission_title: Multi-Sensor Fusion for Autonomous Vehicle Localization
summary: This project implements an autonomous vehicle localization system leveraging multi-sensor fusion (IMU, Lidar, Mono Camera, GPS) with adaptive fuzzy logic weighting for precise pose estimation in simulated and real-world scenarios.

project_title: Behavioral Modelling of Phase-Locked Loop using Deep Learning Techniques
submission_title: Deep Learning for Phase-Locked Loop Behavioral Modeling
summary: This project employs deep learning via a trained neural network to model Phase-Locked Loop behavior, estimating 6 output parameters from 15 input parameters sourced from MATLAB simulations.

project_title: Carbon Neutrality
submission_title: Carbon Neutrality Simulation with TVP-VAR and Deep Learning
summary: This MATLAB toolbox simulates carbon neutrality paths using TVP-VAR and Monte Carlo, and predicts CO2 emissions with an LSTM Deep Learning model, leveraging recent CO2 data.

project_title: Change Detection in Hyperspectral Imagery
submission_title: Wetland Loss Mapping via Hyperspectral Change Detection
summary: This project uses multi-temporal hyperspectral imagery and MATLAB to detect and map wetland loss by calculating NDWI and ΔNDWI, generating loss maps and area statistics for environmental monitoring.
authors: Thanmayee Bhusarapu, Y. Sai Keerthi, A. Vanshika
affiliation: BVRIT HYDERABAD College of Engineering for Women.

project_title: Classify Object Behavior to Enhance the Safety of Autonomous Vehicles
submission_title: RNN-Based Risk Classification for Autonomous Vehicles
summary: An RNN classifies object behavior and predicts risk from preprocessed sensor data to enhance autonomous vehicle safety, featuring data augmentation and a MATLAB GUI.

project_title: Classify Object Behavior to Enhance the Safety of Autonomous Vehicles
submission_title: AI-driven Object Behavior Classification for Autonomous Vehicle Safety
summary: This project develops an AI-driven framework for autonomous vehicles to classify surrounding object behavior (safe/risky) using machine and deep learning on radar and camera sensor data from MATLAB/Simulink simulations.
authors: Yogesh Kumar Mishra, Shravani Vundavilli, Aditya Das

project_title: Classify RF Signals Using AI
submission_title: Real-time RF Signal Classification for Interference Detection
summary: This project classifies real-time WiFi and Bluetooth RF signals using a machine learning model, developed in MATLAB with Adalm Pluto SDRs, to detect interference.
authors: Aswin Sankesh G S, Balavadhana B, Ganeshkumar V, Velmurugan P G S

project_title: Classify RF Signals Using AI
submission_title: Deep Learning Classification of WLAN and Zigbee Signals
summary: A MATLAB deep learning classifier identifies Zigbee and WLAN signals from spectrogram images, supporting synthetic generation and live classification using an ADALM-PLUTO SDR.

project_title: Classify RF Signals Using AI
submission_title: Spectrogram Semantic Segmentation for ISM Band RF Signal Classification
summary: A deep learning semantic segmentation network classifies overlapping WLAN, Bluetooth, ZigBee, and SmartBAN signals in the ISM band, using synthetic spectrograms for training and evaluation with real SDR captures.
authors: Nicola Gallucci, Giacomo Aragnetti, Matteo Malagrin

project_title: Coastline Prediction using Existing Climate Change Models
submission_title: Global and Regional Sea Level Rise Mapping
summary: MATLAB scripts visualize global sea level trends and project future rise for Texas coastlines, including South Padre Island, using climate change data and a 10mm/year average projection.

project_title: Coastline Prediction using Existing Climate Change Models
submission_title: Coastline Visualization and Prediction using Geo-Spatial Data
summary: A MATLAB application to visualize predicted coastlines for a chosen region and future year by analyzing public elevation data and NOAA sea level rise predictions.

project_title: Coastline Prediction using Existing Climate Change Models
submission_title: Global Coastline Prediction Using Existing Climate Models
summary: A MATLAB application visualizes coastline changes from sea level rise using USGS/NASA elevation models and Copernicus climate projections to identify at-risk areas.
affiliation: Universidad Nacional Abierta y a Distancia

project_title: Coastline Prediction using Existing Climate Change Models
submission_title: Predictive Coastline Modeling using Machine Learning and Curve Fitting for Sea Level Rise
summary: This project utilizes curve fitting and machine learning methods to analyze sea level data, make future predictions, and visualize the impact of sea level rise on coastlines.

project_title: Cone Detection for Formula Student Driverless Competition
submission_title: YOLOv2-based Cone Detection for Formula Student Driverless
summary: This project implements a YOLOv2-based computer vision system for real-time cone detection and tracking in Formula Student Driverless competitions, utilizing the FSOCO dataset and ROS.
affiliation: Fr. Conceicao Rodrigues College of Engineering

project_title: Cone Detection for Formula Student Driverless Competition
submission_title: Cone Detection for Formula Student Driverless Competition
summary: This project implements YOLOv2 cone detection using MATLAB and Simulink within a virtual Formula Student driverless environment for autonomous vehicle navigation.

project_title: Cone Detection for Formula Student Driverless Competition
submission_title: Cone Detection for Formula Student Driverless Competition
summary: This project uses MATLAB and Simulink to train a YOLOv2 object detection algorithm for identifying blue and yellow cones in a virtual environment, aiming to enhance autonomous Formula Student racing navigation.

project_title: Cone Detection for Formula Student Driverless Competition
submission_title: Cone Detection for Formula Student Driverless Competition
summary: A Matlab project for cone detection, processing video to identify cones on both sides of a Formula Student driverless car, with future GPU deployment planned for live camera feed.
affiliation: Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology

project_title: Cone Detection for Formula Student Driverless Competition
submission_title: Simulink Deep Learning Cone Detection for Formula Student Driverless
summary: This project implements YOLO v2 deep learning for cone detection in a Formula Student driverless vehicle simulation using Simulink and the Vehicle Dynamics Blockset, with deployment to NVIDIA Jetson.

project_title: Control, Modeling, Design, and Simulation of Modern HVAC Systems
submission_title: HVAC System Control, Modeling, and Simulation in Simscape
summary: This project develops a Simscape model of a 3-room apartment's HVAC system, incorporating PI control, dehumidification logic, and an air-handling unit for environmental management.

project_title: Deep Image Prior for Inverse Problems in Imaging
submission_title: Deep Image Prior for Fetal Ultrasound Enhancement
summary: This MATLAB implementation of Deep Image Prior (DIP) applies an untrained convolutional neural network to perform denoising and super-resolution on fetal ultrasound images without requiring large datasets or pretraining.

project_title: Deep Learning for UAV Infrastructure Inspection
submission_title: Deep Learning for UAV Road Crack Detection
summary: This project implements UAV-based road crack and hole detection using a YOLOv2 deep learning model, processing live video streams within a photorealistic Simulink simulation integrated with Unreal Engine.

project_title: Detection and Visualization of CO2 Concentration Using Hyperspectral Satellite Data
submission_title: Detection and Visualization of CO2 Concentration Using Hyperspectral Satellite Data
summary: This project processes hyperspectral satellite data using MATLAB's Hyperspectral Imaging and Mapping Toolboxes, along with CTMF and k-means clustering, to detect and visualize CO₂ concentrations on a world map.

project_title: Energy Management for a 2-Motor BEV using Model-Predictive Control
submission_title: Energy Management for Dual-Motor BEVs with MPC and Rule-Based Logic
summary: This project designs and evaluates a nonlinear Model Predictive Control strategy, augmented with rule-based logic, for optimal torque distribution and enhanced energy efficiency in a 2-motor Battery Electric Vehicle.

project_title: Energy Management for a 2-Motor BEV using Model-Predictive Control
submission_title: Energy Management for a 2-Motor BEV using Model-Predictive Control
summary: Developed a Nonlinear Model Predictive Control (NMPC) algorithm for 2-motor BEVs to optimally distribute torque, achieving 1.07% SOC consumption reduction compared to baseline Hamiltonian optimization.

project_title: Face Detection and Human Tracking Robot
submission_title: Robotic Navigation Integrating Vision, Voice, and Kalman Filters
summary: This project develops a robot capable of face detection, human tracking, GPS navigation enhanced by Kalman filtering for trajectory, and voice command control, communicating via UDP to a Raspberry Pi.

project_title: Face Detection and Human Tracking Robot
submission_title: Multi-Modal Human Tracking Robot Car with Advanced Navigation
summary: A robot car that performs human face tracking, voice control, obstacle avoidance, and trail following, featuring an advanced Android/Simulink or on-board OpenCV detection system.

project_title: Face Detection and Human Tracking Robot
submission_title: Face Detection and Human Tracking Android-Arduino Robot
summary: An Android-Arduino robot uses a Simulink-deployed face detection model on an Android device to autonomously track humans and maintain a predefined distance via serial or TCP/IP communication.

project_title: Face Detection and Human Tracking Robot
submission_title: Deep Learning for Real-Time Quadcopter Person Tracking
summary: This project implements a real-time deep learning-based system using MATLAB, ROS2, and Python for recognizing and tracking a person of interest with quadcopters by generating flight control signals.

project_title: Fluid Flow Simulation Using Physics-Informed Neural Networks
submission_title: Fluid Flow Simulation Using Physics-Informed Neural Networks
summary: This project applies Physics-Informed Neural Networks in MATLAB to solve 2D incompressible Navier-Stokes equations, predicting fluid velocity, pressure, and discovering viscosity from simulation data.

project_title: Green Hydrogen Production
submission_title: Modeling and Simulation of a Green Hydrogen Energy Storage DC Microgrid
summary: Simscape/Simulink model of a DC microgrid that integrates a photovoltaic (PV) panel with a unitized regenerative fuel cell (URFC) to study the feasibility and efficiency of green hydrogen energy storage.

project_title: Human Motion Recognition Using IMUs
submission_title: IMU-Based Human Motion Recognition for Running Detection
summary: This project classifies human running motion using smartphone IMU data, processed into spectrograms and fed to a GoogLeNet model for real-time running/not-running detection via MATLAB Mobile.

project_title: Human Motion Recognition Using IMUs
submission_title: MATLAB Mobile Fitness Tracker: Activity and Diet Analysis
summary: A MATLAB app tracking fitness activities (classified via IMU/GPS and ML models) and food intake (Nutritionix API), providing workout analysis, intensity scores, and dietary management for personalized fitness goals.
authors: Kevin Le, Justin Wu, Tenzin Choezin
affiliation: University of California, Davis, and University of California, Irvine

project_title: Intelligent Fan Air Cooling System
submission_title: Intelligent Sustainable Cooling with Fuzzy Logic Control
summary: A Simulink model of an energy-efficient fan system that uses a Fuzzy Logic Controller and nanocomposite paint to utilize cool night-time air for smart daytime thermal regulation.
authors: Yuvarajan V K, Sowmiya M, Sedhupathi R B, Vijayalaksmi B

project_title: Landslide Susceptibility Mapping using Machine Learning
submission_title: Landslide Susceptibility Mapping Using Machine Learning
summary: This MATLAB project trains a cascade forward neural network on geographical parameter maps and historical landslide data to generate landslide susceptibility maps, incorporating innovative ROI segmentation.

project_title: Landslide Susceptibility Mapping using Machine Learning
submission_title: Landslide Susceptibility Mapping Using Neural Networks
summary: This project develops a deep learning model using MATLAB's Deep Learning Toolbox, geospatial features, and remote sensing data to predict and map landslide susceptibility.
authors: Kaarnika A, Srinidhi B, Balaji S, and Hemanth M

project_title: MIMO Engine Airpath Control
submission_title: MIMO Engine Airpath Control for Transient Torque Tracking
summary: This project implements multi-input multi-output scheduled model predictive controllers for SI engine airpath components to improve transient torque tracking in a simulated dynamometer.
authors: Patrick Marlatt, Frederick Peterson, Jonathan Wozny

project_title: Multi-UAV Path Planning for Urban Air Mobility
submission_title: Urban Multi-UAV Path Planning and Dynamic Task Reallocation
summary: This project develops Two Step Interplanner algorithms, including one with conflict resolution, for efficient multi-UAV path planning in urban delivery scenarios, further exploring dynamic task reallocation.

project_title: Multi-UAV Path Planning for Urban Air Mobility
submission_title: Multi-UAV Path Planning for Urban Air Mobility
summary: This project develops an enhanced RRT*-based algorithm for 3D multi-UAV path planning in urban environments, incorporating collision avoidance via pseudo-obstacles and local replanning, validated on real-world urban maps.

project_title: Music Composition with Deep Learning
submission_title: Algorithmic Music Composition with LSTM Generative Adversarial Networks
summary: This MATLAB project generates music using a trained LSTM-based Generative Adversarial Network, processing MIDI files to compose new sequences from seed notes.
affiliation: Pillai College of Engineering , New Panvel

project_title: Path Planning for Autonomous Race Cars
submission_title: Curvature-Based Path and Velocity Optimization for Autonomous Racecars
summary: Discrete waypoint optimizer using a curvature-optimization approach coupled with a point-mass velocity profiler to determine the fastest possible path and speed on a race track subject to force and mass constraints.

project_title: Path Planning for Autonomous Race Cars
submission_title: Optimal Raceline Generation and Tracking for Autonomous Race Cars
summary: This project optimizes racelines for autonomous race cars using quadratic programming to generate minimum curvature trajectories and velocity profiles, validated with Simulink-based Stanley control.

project_title: Path Planning for Autonomous Race Cars
submission_title: RC Race Car Trajectory Optimization and Tracking Control
summary: This project develops a non-linear RC car model and control system, implementing pure pursuit and classical control for trajectory tracking, and exploring online optimization with obstacle avoidance.

project_title: Portable Charging System for Electric Vehicles
submission_title: Portable Charging System for Electric Vehicles
summary: A MATLAB simulation models a bidirectional electric vehicle charger using a buck-boost converter, enabling both grid-to-vehicle charging and vehicle-to-grid power transfer for energy selling and sharing.

project_title: Portable Charging System for Electric Vehicles
submission_title: Portable Buck Converter Battery Electric Vehicle Charger
summary: simulation of A portable Buck Converter EV charger (BCEVC) designed to be carried in a vehicle's trunk for a quick, high-current (50A) recharge to get the user to the nearest charging station.

project_title: Portable Charging System for Electric Vehicles
submission_title: Portable Charging System for Electric Vehicles
summary: This project designs a portable electric vehicle charger using a Li-ion battery, bidirectional buck-boost converter with IGBTs, and a PI controller to regulate voltage and current for efficient, safe on-the-go charging.

project_title: Predictive Electric Vehicle Cooling
submission_title: Predictive EV Battery Thermal and Energy Requirements Analysis
summary: This project designs an energy-efficient and thermally optimized EV battery pack by analyzing energy and heat dissipation requirements using WLTP drive cycle data, Excel calculations, and MATLAB, aiming to improve range and performance.

project_title: Quadruped Robot with a Manipulator
submission_title: Quadruped Robot with Manipulator: Path Planning and Control
summary: This project integrates a quadruped robot utilizing the Raibert gait strategy, a robotic manipulator for object interaction, and RRT* path planning, controlled via a MATLAB GUI and Simscape simulation.
authors: Serena Cicin Sain, Will Foster, Joseph Moore, Olivia Organ, Josh Orme-Herbert, Sherif H El Sawwaf

project_title: Quadruped Robot with a Manipulator
submission_title: Quadruped Manipulator Robotic System Simulation
summary: A quadruped robot with a manipulator is developed in MATLAB/Simulink, featuring forward/inverse kinematics, Raibert gait control, and a GUI for environment mapping, integrated with Unreal Engine for simulation.
authors: Lucas Argyrou, Ollie B, George, Jenna, Hari, Ollie R, Jamie

project_title: Robust Visual SLAM Using MATLAB Mobile Sensor Streaming
submission_title: Robust Visual SLAM Using MATLAB Mobile Sensor Streaming
summary: A visual SLAM workflow in MATLAB, acquiring and transferring image/sensor data from mobile phones for real-time navigation and mapping, implementing the ORB SLAM framework.

project_title: Robust Visual SLAM Using MATLAB Mobile Sensor Streaming
submission_title: Robust Visual SLAM Using MATLAB Mobile Sensor Streaming
summary: A MATLAB-based app providing robust visual SLAM and pose estimation using mobile device camera, IMU, and GPS data, with an interactive App Designer UI for indoor and outdoor operations.

project_title: Satellite Collision Avoidance
submission_title: Orbital State Estimation and Collision Risk with Gaussian Sum Filter
summary: This MATLAB toolbox implements a Gaussian Sum Unscented Kalman Filter for orbital state estimation, benchmarked against Monte Carlo simulations, and applied to assess collision probability between space objects.

project_title: Sensor Fusion for Autonomous Systems
submission_title: Comparative Sensor Fusion for Self-Balancing Bicycle State Estimation
summary: This project developed an autonomous self-balancing bicycle with a closed-loop controller, employing noisy IMU and wheel encoder data for real-time state estimation using EKF and weighted average sensor fusion techniques.

project_title: Sentiment Analysis in Cryptocurrency Trading
submission_title: Bitcoin Price Prediction via Sentiment and CNN-LSTM
summary: Predicts Bitcoin prices by integrating sentiment analysis from cryptocurrency tweets with historical price data, utilizing a MATLAB-implemented CNN-LSTM deep learning model.
authors: Guoshun He, Mengsha Liu, Xiwei Yu,  Zhuotong Sheng

project_title: Signal Coverage Maps Using Measurements and Machine Learning
submission_title: Signal Coverage Maps Using Measurements and Machine Learning
summary: This project generates signal coverage maps using Log-Distance Path Loss, Ordinary Kriging, and Kriging with Drift models, alongside machine learning regression techniques, evaluating performance with MSE/RMSE.

project_title: Signal Coverage Maps Using Measurements and Machine Learning
submission_title: Advanced Machine Learning for RSRP Coverage Map Prediction
summary: This project predicts RSRP values to create signal coverage maps by comparing channel propagation models, geostatistical methods like Kriging, and diverse machine learning techniques, with top performance from optimized GPR in MATLAB.

project_title: Simulink Hearing Aid
submission_title: Simulink Hearing Aid System Multi-Channel Compressor
summary: This project implements a single channel of a multi-channel hearing aid compressor system in MATLAB Simulink, applying gain in linear, compressor, and limiter regions for dynamic signal processing.

project_title: Smart Watering System with Internet of Things
submission_title: IoT Vertical Farm System with AI Monitoring and Simulink Control
summary: An IoT-enabled vertical farm system integrates AI for strawberry health monitoring, Simulink models for temperature, irrigation, and power control, and ThingSpeak for communication.

project_title: Smart Watering System with Internet of Things
submission_title: Smart Watering System with IoT and Neural Network
summary: IoT system built on a Raspberry Pi that uses a Neural Network to predict the precise valve duration (water amount) required for a plant based on real-time sensor data and sends alerts via the ThingSpeak cloud platform.

project_title: Smart Watering System with Internet of Things
submission_title: IoT-Enabled MATLAB Smart Irrigation Control
summary: This project uses IoT sensors, ThingSpeak, and a MATLAB state machine on Arduino/ESP32 hardware to automate indoor plant irrigation and optimize water usage via a web dashboard.
authors: Caleb Lefcort, Arvand Marandi, Madison Spink, Matt Nguyen

project_title: Snake-like Robot Modeling and Navigation
submission_title: Simscape Multibody Snake Robot: Autonomous Waypoint Navigation
summary: Developed a Simscape Multibody snake robot model with anisotropic friction, implementing PID/PD control for serpentine motion and autonomous waypoint navigation managed by Stateflow logic.
affiliation: Institut National des Sciences Appliquées de Rennes

project_title: Snake-like Robot Modeling and Navigation
submission_title: Multi-link Snake Robot Head Tracking Control
summary: This project develops a Simscape model of a multi-link snake robot with head tracking control, enabling it to follow a reference path via holonomic constraints.

project_title: Snake-like Robot Modeling and Navigation
submission_title: Snake-like Robot Modeling and Navigation
summary: This project presents a snake-like robot composed of 5 cylinders that uses rod movements for locomotion and proximity sensors for dynamic obstacle avoidance in an unfamiliar environment.

project_title: Snake-like Robot Modeling and Navigation
submission_title: Snake Robot Modeling and Navigation Using Serpenoid Gait
summary: This project presents a 6-link snake-like robot model in Simscape Multibody, utilizing the serpenoid curve equation for gait and the LOS guidance law for straight-line navigation.

project_title: Solar Tracker Control Simulation
submission_title: Solar Tracker Control Simulation
summary: This project presents a simulation of a solar tracker control system developed as a solution to a MATLAB and Simulink challenge.

project_title: Solar Tracker Control Simulation
submission_title: Simulink Dual-Axis Solar Tracker Control Simulation
summary: This project develops a simulation-based control system for a dual-axis solar tracker using MATLAB and Simulink to accurately track the sun's path and maximize energy production.

project_title: Solar Tracker Control Simulation
submission_title: Solar Tracker Simulation: Control, MPPT, and BESS
summary: This Simscape Multibody simulation optimizes solar energy capture using PID control, ANN-based irradiance prediction, MPPT, Stateflow modes, and integrated battery storage.
authors: Kshitij Shetty, Kaustuv Devmishra, Krishan Swami, Mihir Hemani

project_title: Solar Tracker Control Simulation
submission_title: Simulink Solar Tracking System with PID Control
summary: Simulation of a solar tracking system integrating motor, panel, and PID controller subsystems, tested with model reference data using MATLAB Simulink.

project_title: Solar Tracker Control Simulation
submission_title: Photovoltaic Solar Tracker Control Simulation
summary: This project simulates a photovoltaic solar tracker system, integrating PV cell modeling, maximum power point control, and axial motion control within a MATLAB/Simulink environment.

project_title: Solar Tracker Control Simulation
submission_title: Simulink Solar Tracking System with PID Motor Control
summary: This project simulates a PID-controlled solar tracking system using Simulink, Simscape Multibody, and Simscape Electrical to dynamically orient a solar panel based on sun position and optimize power generation.

project_title: Solar Tracker Control Simulation
submission_title: Intelligent Solar Tracker Control via Machine Learning in Simulink
summary: This project develops a MATLAB/Simulink framework for intelligent dual-axis solar tracking, using Random Forest and Deep Learning models trained on weather data to predict optimal panel positions, outperforming traditional astronomical methods.
affiliation: Universidad Nacional Abierta y a Distancia (UNAD)

project_title: Solar Tracker Control Simulation
submission_title: Solar Panel Energy Optimization and Tracking Simulation
summary: Optimizes fixed solar panel parameters via MATLAB and simulates a two-axis solar tracker with PID control in Simulink/Simscape for dynamic energy capture.
affiliation: California State University, Los Angeles, and University of California, Berkeley

project_title: Speech Background Noise Suppression with Deep Learning
submission_title: RNN-based Speech Noise Suppression using MATLAB Deep Learning
summary: This MATLAB project implements a speech noise suppression system using an RNN-based deep learning model, trained with MFCC features, to estimate spectral gains for denoising.
authors: Xie Mingqi, Hefang Zhang, Xiaoheng Xia, Yu Guo

project_title: Speech Background Noise Suppression with Deep Learning
submission_title: MATLAB FullSubNet for Deep Speech Noise Suppression
summary: This MATLAB project implements the FullSubNet deep learning model for real-time single-channel speech enhancement, trained on Microsoft DNS Challenge datasets to suppress background noise from speech.
affiliation: University of Waterloo, Texas Christian University

project_title: Speech Background Noise Suppression with Deep Learning
submission_title: Fine-Tuned DenoiseNet for Speech Denoising
summary: A DenoiseNet deep learning architecture, fine-tuned in MATLAB using the Audio Toolbox and Deep Learning Toolbox, to effectively suppress background noise in speech signals.
authors: Eric Vo, Kailash Rao, Siwoo Chung, Gabriel Ramos

project_title: Techno-Economic Assessment of Green Hydrogen Production
submission_title: Techno-Economic Assessment of Green Hydrogen Production
summary: This project performs a techno-economic assessment of green hydrogen production using a MATLAB Simscape model, analyzing 242 global locations to identify optimal sites for minimizing costs and grid reliance.
authors: Mohamed Khaled Khalafallah, Karim Mohamed El-lethy, Hazem Hossam Ibrahium, Nourhan Nasser Ahmed, Salma Abdelbast Ali, Mayar Sayed Mohamed, Aya Hesham Mostafa

project_title: Top Quark Detection with Deep Learning and Big Data
submission_title: Deep CNN for Top Quark Jet Classification
summary: A deep CNN with aggregated residual and Squeeze-and-Excite blocks classifies multi-channel particle jet images for real-time top quark detection, achieving 90.87% accuracy and enabling FPGA deployment.
affiliation: SVKM's Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering

project_title: Traffic Data Analysis for Modeling and Prediction of Traffic Scenarios
submission_title: NARX Network Modeling for Traffic Scenario Prediction
summary: This project develops and evaluates a MATLAB-based Nonlinear Autoregressive with External Input (NARX) neural network model to predict vehicle behavior in traffic scenarios, achieving R^2 0.90 and MSE 9.47e-3.
affiliation: University of Modena e Reggio Emilia

project_title: Vibration Detection and Rejection from IMU Data
submission_title: IMU Vibration Detection and Compensation System
summary: A MATLAB project implementing realistic IMU vibration modeling, detection via frequency analysis, and compensation using Low-Pass, Notch, Adaptive, and Kalman filtering methods.

project_title: Voice Controlled Robot
submission_title: Raspberry Pi Voice-Controlled Robot with CNN Speech and Vision
summary: This project implements a Raspberry Pi-based robot controlled by voice commands, utilizing a Convolutional Neural Network for speech recognition, along with image processing for color-based object detection and navigation.
authors: Xiaoxuan Yang, Xilei Zhu, He Huang

project_title: Wind Turbine Predictive Maintenance Using Machine Learning
submission_title: Wind Turbine Geartrain Fault Classification via CNN Spectrograms
summary: A machine learning system classifies wind turbine geartrain faults using MATLAB simulations, spectrograms, and CNNs, enabling adaptive predictive maintenance recommendations based on fault severity.
authors: Saranya M, Kavyasree U, Devansh S
